name: Capricorn
description: Oannios, goddess of Capricorn, embodies the rebellion and free will of both mortals and gods.

skills.name: Swarpblaster
skills.description: Capricorn swaps positions with the symmetrically opposite enemy at combat start and drains 50% of their max HP, which is slowly restored over 5s.

upgrades.level2: The target takes 10% increased DMG during the effect.
upgrades.level3: The lost HP is slowly restored over 8s.
upgrades.level4: The target takes 20% increased DMG during the effect.

skills.name: Blade Dance
skills.description: Capricorn combines her blades and dances, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK 4 times to surrounding enemies. She restores HP equal to 20% of ATK for each enemy hit.

upgrades.level2: DMG dealt per hit increases to 115% ATK.
upgrades.level3: DMG dealt per hit increases to 130% ATK.

skills.name: Soulbind
skills.description: Capricorn stuns an enemy for 5s, dealing DMG equal to 50% of ATK to them per sec.

upgrades.level2: DMG dealt per sec increases to 60% ATK.
upgrades.level3: When cast, it increases her ATK SPD by 20% for the next 5s.
